# Filter by length
<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->



Removes all strings that are shorter than 'min' characters and longer than 'max' characters.


## Parameter

### Min

No description

- Datatype: `int`
- Default Value: `0`



### Max

No description

- Datatype: `int`
- Default Value: `2147483647`
